jump_scares.spoiler: The blob suddenly slides up the stick
As Brian sits down, the can man appears behind Brian with an axe
After talking on the phone, Paul looks up, and sees the blob drop down on him from the roof
When Scott starts groping Vicky, the blob wraps itself around Scott’s arm and Vicky’s face begins to melt
The blob launches up from the sink drain, and pulls the diner worker through it
Brian slips and falls down on the floor
While the theatre manager is walking through the projector room, a yoyo drops down right in front of him
After being dragged under the water in the sewer by the blob, a badly dissolved Eddie jumps up from the water
A soldier is suddenly grabbed by the blob
After leaving the motorcycle behind in the sewer, a soldier abruptly walks into Brian
The blob crashes up through the sewer hole
